chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: AbsRing
V: CompleteNormedModule K

Goal:
forall (P : V -> Prop) (x : V), (forall y : V, P y -> y = x) -> P x -> iota P = x

Premises:
Notation CompleteNormedModule := CompleteNormedModule.type
iota = fun (T : CompleteSpace) (P : T -> Prop) => lim (fun A : T -> Prop => forall x : T, P x -> A x) : forall T : CompleteSpace, (T -> Prop) -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
iota_correct_weak : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x y : ?T, P x -> P y -> close x y) -> forall x : ?T, P x -> close (iota P) x where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- CompleteSpace]
NormedModule.Mixin : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModuleAux K) (norm : V -> R) (norm_factor : R), (forall x y : V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y) -> (forall (l : K) (x : V), norm (scal l x) <= abs l * norm x) -> (forall (x y : V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y) -> (forall (x y : V) (eps : posreal), ball x eps y -> norm (minus y x) < norm_factor * eps) -> (forall x : V, norm x = 0 -> x = zero) -> NormedModule.mixin_of K V
locally_norm = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (x : V) (P : V -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball_norm x eps y -> P y : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K), V -> (V -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ function_scope]
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
Build_ProperFilter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), (forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x) -> Filter F -> ProperFilter F
filterlimi_locally_cauchy : forall f : ?T -> ?U -> Prop, at_point ?a (fun x : ?T => (exists y : ?U, f x y) /\ (forall y1 y2 : ?U, f x y1 -> f x y2 -> y1 = y2)) -> (forall eps : posreal, exists P : ?T -> Prop, at_point ?a P /\ (forall u v : ?T, P u -> P v -> forall u' v' : ?U, f u u' -> f v v' -> ball u' eps v')) < -> (exists y : ?U, filterlimi f (at_point ?a) (locally y)) where ?U : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- CompleteSpace] ?T : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- UniformSpace] ?a : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- UniformSpace.sort ?T]
subset_filter_proper : forall dom : ?T -> Prop, (forall P : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> exists x : ?T, dom x /\ P x) -> ProperFilter (subset_filter ?F dom) where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- Type] ?F : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_locally_cauchy : forall f : ?T -> ?U, (forall eps : posreal, exists P : ?T -> Prop, at_point ?a P /\ (forall u v : ?T, P u -> P v -> ball (f u) eps (f v))) < -> (exists y : ?U, filterlim f (at_point ?a) (locally y)) where ?U : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- CompleteSpace] ?T : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- UniformSpace] ?a : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- UniformSpace.sort ?T]
filterlim_switch_dom : forall F1 : (?T1 -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F1 -> forall F2 : (?T2 -> Prop) -> Prop, Filter F2 -> forall dom : ?T2 -> Prop, (forall P : ?T2 -> Prop, F2 P -> exists x : ?T2, dom x /\ P x) ->...-> exists l : ?U, filterlim h F1 (locally l) /\ filterlim g (within dom F2) (locally l) where ?T1 : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- Type] ?T2 : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- CompleteSpace]
filtermapi = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => exists y : U, f x y /\ P y) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
is_filter_lim = fun (T : UniformSpace) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (x : T) => forall P : T -> Prop, locally x P -> F P : forall T : UniformSpace, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope _]
close_iota : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x <-> Q x) -> close (iota P) (iota Q) where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- CompleteSpace]
filterlim_locally_unique = fun (T : Type) (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter' F) (f : T -> V) (x y : V) => is_filter_lim_unique x y : forall (T : Type) (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter' F -> forall (f : T -> V) (x y : V), filterlim f F (locally x) -> filterlim f F (locally y) -> x = y Arguments T, K, V, F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ function_scope _ function_scope _ _ _ _]
Record mixin_of (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModuleAux K) : Type := Mixin { norm : V -> R; norm_factor : R; ax1 : forall x y : V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y; ax2 : forall (l : K) (x : V), norm (scal l x) <= abs l * norm x; ax3 : forall (x y : V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y; ax4 : forall (x y : V) (eps : posreal), ball x eps y -> norm (minus y x) < norm_factor * eps; ax5 : forall x : V, norm x = 0 -> x = zero } For Mixin: Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope R_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
filter_imp = fun (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (Filter0 : Filter F) => let (_, _, filter_imp) := Filter0 in filter_imp : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), Filter F -> forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q Arguments T, F, Filter are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope function_scope _]
cauchy_distance : (forall eps : posreal, exists x : ?T, at_point ?a (ball x eps)) < -> (forall eps : posreal, exists P : ?T -> Prop, at_point ?a P /\ (forall u v : ?T, P u -> P v -> ball u eps v)) where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- UniformSpace] ?a : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- UniformSpace.sort ?T]
filter_le = fun (T : Type) (F G : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) => forall P : T -> Prop, G P -> F P : forall T : Type, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope]
filter_ex : forall P : ?T -> Prop, at_point ?a P -> exists x : ?T, P x where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- UniformSpace] ?a : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- UniformSpace.sort ?T]
within = fun (T : Type) (D : T -> Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : T -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => D x -> P x) : forall T : Type, (T -> Type) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filter_and = fun (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (Filter0 : Filter F) => let (_, filter_and, _) := Filter0 in filter_and : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), Filter F -> forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x) Arguments T, F, Filter are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope _ _]
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
filterlimi_locally_unique = fun (T : Type) (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter' F) (f : T -> V -> Prop) (x y : V) (Hf : F (fun x0 : T => forall y1 y2 : V, f x0 y1 -> f x0 y2 -> y1 = y2)) (Hx : filterlimi f F (locally x)) (Hy : filterlimi f F (locally y)) => ball_norm_eq x y (fun eps : posreal => let Hx0 : filtermapi f F (ball_norm x (pos_div_2 eps)) := Hx (ball_norm x (pos_div_2 eps)) (locally_ball_norm x (pos_div_2 eps)) in let Hy0 : filtermapi f F (ball_norm y (pos_div_2 eps)) := Hy (ball_norm y (pos_div_2 eps)) (...
is_filter_lim_locally_close : forall x y : ?T, is_filter_lim (locally x) y -> close x y where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- UniformSpace]
is_filter_lim_locally_unique : forall x y : ?V, is_filter_lim (locally x) y -> x = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- NormedModule ?K]
filtermap = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => P (f x)) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
ball_norm_le : forall (x : ?V) (e1 e2 : posreal), e1 <= e2 -> forall y : ?V, ball_norm x e1 y -> ball_norm x e2 y where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- NormedModule ?K]
ball_sym : forall (x y : ?M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x where ?M : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- UniformSpace]
ball_triangle : forall (x y z : ?M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z where ?M : [K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K |- UniformSpace]
